SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Nexus URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_BASE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_REPOSITORY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_FILE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_NXS_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Action name : SET &UC4RB_NXS_ACTION_NAME# = "UploadRawArtifactAction"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#, string, 22
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[5] = "-username" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_USERNAME#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[7] = "-repository" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_REPOSITORY#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[9] = "-filepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_FILE#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[11] = "-filename" : IF &UC4RB_NXS_FILE_NAME# = "" : SET &POS#=STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_NXS_FILE#,"\") : IF &POS# = 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Invalid file path provided: &UC4RB_NXS_FILE#" : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_NXS_FILE_NAME# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_NXS_FILE#,&POS#) : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_FILE_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[13] = "-directory" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_NXS_DIRECTORY#" : SET &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[14] = "&UC4RB_NXS_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : IF &UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD# <> "" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : ENDIF
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Attaching Java Resource :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_NXS_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% "
!------------------------------------------ Status messages -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** UPLOAD RAW ARTIFACT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** UPLOAD RAW ARTIFACT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
